org.apache.juneau.http.response

Class HttpExceptionBuilder<T extends BasicHttpException>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.juneau.BasicRuntimeException.Builder
      • org.apache.juneau.http.response.HttpExceptionBuilder<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The bean type to create for this builder.

    public class HttpExceptionBuilder<T extends BasicHttpException>
extends BasicRuntimeException.Builder
    Builder for BasicHttpException beans.

        public HttpExceptionBuilder<T> statusLine(BasicStatusLine value)
        Sets the protocol version on the status line.

        If not specified, "HTTP/1.1" will be used.

        Parameters:
        value - The new value.

      • statusCode

        public HttpExceptionBuilder<T> statusCode(int value)
        Sets the status code on the status line.

        If not specified, 0 will be used.

        Returns:
        This object.

      • reasonPhrase

        public HttpExceptionBuilder<T> reasonPhrase(String value)
        Sets the reason phrase on the status line.

        If not specified, the reason phrase will be retrieved from the reason phrase catalog using the locale on this builder.

        Parameters:
        value - The new value.
        Returns:
        This object.

      • reasonPhraseCatalog

        public HttpExceptionBuilder<T> reasonPhraseCatalog(org.apache.http.ReasonPhraseCatalog value)
        Sets the reason phrase catalog used to retrieve reason phrases.

        If not specified, uses EnglishReasonPhraseCatalog.

        Parameters:
        value - The new value.
        Returns:
        This object.

      • locale

        public HttpExceptionBuilder<T> locale(Locale value)
        Sets the locale used to retrieve reason phrases.

        If not specified, uses Locale.getDefault().

        Parameters:
        value - The new value.
        Returns:
        This object.
